title: San Serif with large X height -- Please ID
content:
Can you ID the font in this logo — maybe it is two fonts? I assume that the “X” has been slightly modified, right?

Thanks, I’d be really appreciative.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005914im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/VendMAX_4569.jpg)

 [‹ Closest typeface available??](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005914/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46752 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ampersand Me ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005914/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46768 "Go to next forum topic")
author: showandtell

comments.content: I think it was based on [Cosmos](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/cosmos-bq/).
